text: Mukund Lath (9 October 1937 - 6 August 2020) was an Indian scholar and cultural historian. He was known for his writings on music, dance, aesthetics and culture of India. He was honored by the Government of India, in 2010, with the fourth highest Indian civilian award of Padma Shri. Lath was born in Kolkata. Lath died on 6 August 2020 in Jaipur at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Indian educators Category:Indian historians
title: Mukund Lath
